content: While it might not be "sufficient" monetarily given that these men significantly more that that as a result of their malfeasance, it at least is a step forward. This Board of Directors  is trying to demonstrate some corporate responsibility both to their company and the shareholders. Yes it has its "image" overtones but what is wrong with that.More boards in more companies should take note --  and act.And just to add something of a bottom line   --- Executive compensation is obscene even on the best of days in the best of companies.
